amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to ensure that states that have taken appropriate measures to increase voter turnout are not subject to additional federal voter registration mandates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Davidson (OH).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.
